page.title: 04The Social Scene.
page.content: Here are some aspects of the social life in our area. {DARBY & JOAN} Snailbeach Darby and Joan was formed in February 1970 and usually meets in afternoons.At their social meetings on Tuesdays they play card games and the gentlemen play dominoes and everyone plays bingo. They serve tea and coffee and biscuits and, of course, converse together.Their meetings take place at Snailbeach Village Hall on Tuesdays. {WOMEN'S INSTITUTE The WI meetings are held once a month normally at the Village Hall. Summer is very busy as in May they had the following activities: The West Midland Show, two talks on Shrewsbury,the county town. They had a trip to see the West Mercia Police HQ and they went on a train trip to Portsmouth. { }
